sentences.sContent: Most of us are more productive in the morning.
sentences.sCn: 我们大多数人在早上更有效率。

sentences.sContent: ...less productive and more likely to quit...
...rather than a web of quantifiable objects or productive potentialities at our disposal...
...It was so productive that there was a shortage of labour to harvest it...
...So we need to "design for productive failure" by building it into the learning process...
...Kapur applied the principle of productive failure to mathematical problem solving in three schools...
...Governments can set better-not necessarily more-rules to encourage productive businesses that make and sell real products and services...
...our fee-earners can be productive as they travel...

synos.tran: 能生产的；生产的，生产性的；多产的；富有成效的

words.tran: 产品；结果；[数] 乘积；作品
生产力；生产率；生产能力
制作人，制片人；生产者；发生器
赢利性；生产率，生产能力；多产性

trans.tranCn: 多产的， 富饶的； 富有成效的
